author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Recruiters on LinkedIn are still losing it — like full-on meltdown mode. One says it’s “unprofessional” to have call screening turned on. Another says you’re “trying to escape” if you keep your jacket on during the interview. Apparently, being thirsty, not being thirsty, answering the phone, not answering the phone… it’s all wrong.

In this sequel to my last video, we dive back into the chaos of recruiter logic — where professionalism means guessing the exact tone, hydration level, and jacket position that will get you hired. From recruiters mad about “open to work” banners to others bragging about avoiding them entirely, it’s the same corporate theater — just with new clowns.

If you’ve ever been told you’re too professional, not professional enough, or that your ringtone ruined your career — welcome to LinkedIn. You’re gonna love it here.

#RecruiterCringe #LinkedInLunatics #JoshuaFluke

Need a resume / cover letter? ➡️ https://joshuafluke.store

title: RECRUITERS ON LINKEDIN ARE STILL LOSING IT!
